snippet: “The Walking Dead,” “The Bible” and “Game of Thrones” all registered impressive ratings on Sunday night.
abstract: Season finales of The Walking Dead on AMC and The Bible on History Channel, as well as season premiere of HBO's Game of Thrones, are broadcast on same night and all post big ratings.
lead_paragraph: “The Walking Dead,” “The Bible” and “Game of Thrones” all registered impressive ratings on Sunday night.

headline.seo: Cable TV Dramas Post Big Sunday Ratings
headline.main: Cable Dramas Post Big Sunday Ratings
headline.print_headline: Cable Dramas Post Big Sunday Ratings
